728810f-a.title: Richmond: Elizabeth Avenue - Richmond Terrace
728810f-a.text:
Elizabeth Avenue, adjoining the S.W. corner of Richmond Terrace. The house belonged to G.W. Campbell, according to Beers's map of 1874. In Robinson's map of 1898 it is designated as having been owned by L. W. Faber. Later (1907 map) it was known as the Cove Hotel and was owned by JJ. Eberhardt Faber. The latter's name also appears in Bromley's
1917 map.
July 5, 1932.
L. Sperr.
